text: - I'm Sachin.

I'm a software management
at Amazon Ad Exchange.

Fast data at high scale
is key in advertising.
My company builds cache products

that provide terabytes of
data within milliseconds

for billions of ad
opportunities every year.

We used to spend 18
months to build workflows
to load and fetch high-scale cache data
from thousands of cache server nodes.

With AWS, we were able to
automate both the workflow
and the infrastructure
to reduce these efforts to just two days.
We chose AWS ElastiCache
for fully managing the cache hardware,

AWS PrivateLink for microsecond
network connectivity,

and CloudFormation for its
automated infrastructure setup.
With these AWS services,
we've built a one-click user experience
to load and access high-scale cache data
in a self-serve manner.
Our generic AWS solution has been used
by more than 25 cache customers,
each one saving more than six months
of caching efforts every year.
Our customers are super happy
to not reinvent the wheel anymore
when it comes to caching operations.
(bright music)
